name: Terror for the Evildoers
description:
Combat Action: When Wriothesley is your active character, equip this card.
After Wriothesley equips this card, immediately use Forceful Fists of Frost once.
When Wriothesley, who has this card equipped, takes DMG or is healed, accumulate 1 "Penalty" point.
When Wriothesley, with this card equipped, uses a Skill: If there are 3 "Penalty" points, consume 3 points to cause this Skill to deal +1 DMG.
(You must have Wriothesley in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
